# Fledge

The habit-building adventure. Build better habits while raising your virtual pet.

## Description
Fledge turns daily routines into an epic quest. Every habit completed helps a virtual pet grow, evolve, and explore new worlds. Designed to make personal growth addictive and fun.

## Core Features
- **Hatch & Evolve:** Watch your companion grow through 50+ unique forms.
- **Explore Realms:** Unlock scenic landscapes as your focus strengthens.
- **Equip Gear:** Earn gems to customize your pet with rare items.
- **Habit Tracking:** Streak commitments and visual progress bars.

## Tech Specs
- Platform: iOS 17+
- Developer: Redmont Digital.
